Name: Marufjon
description:
Marufjon is a hardworking and ambitious man who lives in the Bobojon Gafurov region. He was born in 1977, is married and has two children. He is very lovely father.

Marufjon has a beekeeping business. He learned this business from his father and does it very well, producing pure natural honey to sell. His family helps to sell the honey.

Currently, he wants to expand his business but because he has no money to do so, he is requesting a loan from MDO Arvand. This is his first loan from MDO Arvand and looks forward to taking on more loans to expand his business.
